bug.short_desc: Invalid message displays incorrectly when a form item is towards the right hand side of the screen

long_desc.thetext:
Hi guys,
As you can see here (you need to hover over each TextField with the mouse):
http://demo.qooxdoo.org/current/playground/#%7B%22code%22%3A%20%22%252F%252F%2520Document%2520is%2520the%2520application%2520root%250Avar%2520doc%2520%253D%2520this.getRoot%28%29%253B%250A%250Avar%2520text1%2520%253D%2520new%2520qx.ui.form.TextField%28%29%253B%250Avar%2520text2%2520%253D%2520new%2520qx.ui.form.TextField%28%29%253B%250A%250A%252F%252F%2520Add%2520button%2520to%2520document%2520at%2520fixed%2520coordinates%250Adoc.add%28text1%252C%2520%257B%2520left%2520%253A%25205%252C%2520top%2520%2520%253A%25205%2520%257D%29%253B%250Adoc.add%28text2%252C%2520%257B%2520right%2520%253A%25205%252C%2520top%2520%2520%253A%25205%2520%257D%29%253B%250A%250Atext1.setValid%28false%29%253B%250Atext1.setInvalidMessage%28%2522The%2520arrow%2520on%2520this%2520popup%2520is%2520correct%2522%29%253B%250A%250Atext2.setValid%28false%29%253B%250Atext2.setInvalidMessage%28%2522The%2520arrow%2520on%2520this%2520popup%2520is%2520incorrect%2522%29%253B%22%7D
The TextField on the left shows the 'invalid messsege' popup correctly (arrow points towards the TextField) but the TextField on the right displays the 'invalid messsege' popup incorrectly (arrow points away from the TextField).
The bug only shows when the TextField is on the right side of a container and is forced to show the 'invalid messsege' popup to the left.
Hope this makes sense! Steve
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 6308 ***
